title: TruAlt Bioenergy secures Rs 390 crore 1G Bioethanol order from OMCs
description: India's TruAlt Bioenergy has secured a Rs 390 crore order from major oil marketing companies for the supply of 6 crore liters of 1G Bioethanol over three months from August to October 2024. The company has secured 10% of the total allocated quantity. TruAlt has an installed capacity of 14 lakh liters a day for 1G Bioethanol and 10,200 kgs a day for Compressed Biogas production.
